# For Beta Teams Only

This release is for beta teams only. Please download the latest stable release (v2022.4.1) if you are not a beta team. You can find v2022.4.1 at https://github.com/wpilibsuite/vscode-wpilib/releases/tag/v2022.4.1

However, it is strongly recommended to use the full installer at https://github.com/wpilibsuite/allwpilib/releases/tag/v2022.4.1
